About.title: BUILDING THE
About.name: JIMMY JULIO
About.paragraph1: I am a Full Stack JS & AI Developer based in Antananarivo, Tsiadana. My passion lies in building autonomous AI agents and immersive web experiences that push the boundaries of what's possible in the browser.
About.paragraph2: With a deep focus on LangChain implementation and modern JavaScript ecosystems, I create systems that are not just functional, but intelligent and adaptive.
